```{r}
library(rvest)

url <- "https://www.worldometers.info/coronavirus/"
html <- url %>% read_html

corona_table <- html %>%
  html_node(".main_table_countries_div") %>%
  html_table

str(corona_table)
corona_table
corona_table[1] <- list(NULL)
corona_table
corona_table <- corona_table[-1:-8,]

print(corona_table)

```
